VoiceList.Entry: Chole “Welcome.”
Chole “Wasn't it really expensive?”
Chole “But don't be mad at my brother or Grandpa.”
Chole “Ever since Mom and Dad died, it's been like this…”
Chole “Welcome! Here's some good advice.”
“The white Chocobo likes it when you scratch behind its ears.”
“But if you scratch it someplace that it doesn't like,it'll get mad, so be careful.”
Choco Billy “Do you want a Chocobo?”
Cloud “Mmm…” Give me one Nope
Choco Billy “You old folks are out of luck!”
Cloud “Old folks…?”
Choco Billy “Oh,I'm so glad!”
Choco Billy “We're all out of Chocobos. I'm taking care of the ones out there for someone else.”
Choco Billy “You know,if you really want a Chocobo, you should go out and catch one.”
Choco Billy “Want to know how to catch a Chocobo?”
Choco Billy “You see those claw prints out there? Wild Chocobo's will appear in those areas.”
“But,if you don't have 'Chocobo Lure' they won't come out. They're very cautious by nature.”
Choco Billy “'Chocobo Lure' is a type of Materia which attracts Chocobos.”
“If you equip this, they'll come to you. But,without it, they won't appear.”
Choco Billy “A wild Chocobo always appears with other monsters.”
“But,you won't be able to catch it because of the monsters.”
“That is why you must defeat the monsters first before you catch the Chocobo.”
Choco Billy “Wild Chocobos are really cautious. They'll run away from the smallest things.”
“But,if you use 'Greens' they'll focus on them and won't run away.”
Choco Billy “Whatever you do,don't make Chocobos angry. They're usually calm,but if you get them angry,you'll get hurt.”
“Oh,and remember, once you get off a Chocobo, it'll escape.”
Choco Billy “Well then,shall we get down to business?”
Choco Billy “I'll sell you the 'Chocobo Lure' for 2000 gil,right now.”
Choco Billy “You want it?” Buy it Don't buy it
Choco Billy “Thanks!”
Choco Billy “Hey,you don't have enough.”
Choco Billy “Mmmm,if you don't have it, you'll never catch one.”
Choco Billy “The 'Chocobo Lure' is 2000 gil. Buy it now?”
Choco Billy “It wouldn't hurt to buy some 'Greens',either.”
“Oh,and how fast a Chocobo'll finish eating depends on what type of 'Greens' you feed them.”
Choco Billy “Welcome!”
Choco Billy “You can't take that many out at once.”
“You must return the Chocobo that's out, if you want to take out a different one.”
Choco Billy “Which one are you going to take?”
Choco Billy “Ride this one?” Giddyap! Whoa!
Choco Billy “You have all the 'Chocobo Stables' you can carry.”
“If you want to put a Chocobo in it, first,you must let it go and open a 'Chocobo Stable.'”
Choco Billy “You don't even have any 'Chocobo Stables'”
“If you want to raise Chocobos, go talk to Grandpa.”
Choco Billy “It looks like you haven't even caught one yet…”
Choco Billy “Which one are you going to put in the 'Chocobo Stable'?”
“Use the Directional button left or right and [OK].”
Choco Billy “This…is a wonderful Chocobo!”
Choco Billy “This is a great Chocobo.”
Choco Billy “Mmm,this seems like a good Chocobo.”
Choco Billy “This Chocobo's so-so.”
Choco Billy “This is a pretty average Chocobo.”
Choco Billy “Mmm,this one's not bad.”
Choco Billy “This one doesn't seem to be very good.”
Choco Billy “I really can't recommend this one.”
Choco Billy “Want to put this Chocobo in your stable?”
Choco Billy “Then,give Chocobo ,Ç#& a name.”
Choco Billy “I'm really going to let him go.”
Choco Billy “In order for the Chocobo to mate, you need a male and a female…”
Choco Billy “In order for them to mate, you need 'Nuts' too.”
Choco Billy “You don't have any 'Greens'… It just so happens I can sell you one…”
Choco Billy “Yeah,you can ride this one.”
“And even if you take it outside, this Chocobo won't run away when you get off of it.”
“If you want to return it to your 'Chocobo Stable', just ride it onto the farm.”
“Then,you'll be able to feed it again.”
Choco Billy “What the Chocobo eats are 'Greens'. The most famous one is the 'Gysahl Greens'.”
“Chocobos will mature differently depending on which 'Greens' they eat. Certain 'Greens' will boost their stamina.”
“You'll have to figure out which kinds have what effects for yourselves.”
“Oh,and Chocobos are born with certain natural abilities. So,no matter how much they mature,they can't get more abilities than what they're born with.”
“If a Chocobo's abilities don't increase even when you feed it, that means it's reached its limit.”
“It's best to let those kinds of Chocobo go or mate them to get a new Chocobo.”
Choco Billy “A male and a female Chocobo together can produce an egg.”
Choco Billy “The Chocobo out there is part of the stock that you caught.”
“We can only keep 4 Chocobos here at once. If you get a fifth one, the first one will have to be let go.”
“If you don't want that to happen, come back and put it in your own stable.”
Choco Billy “Chocobos' strengths are divided by 'Class'.”
Choco Billy “Which Chocobo are you going to let go?”
Choco Billy “There's still lots of room to grow.”
Choco Billy “It might mature a bit more.”
Choco Billy “Don't expect it to mature anymore.”
Choco Billy “Your 'Chocobo Stable' is empty.”
Choco Billy “Is it all right to let this one go?” Go ahead No,don't
Choco Billy “What you gonna feed him?”
Choco Billy “Looks like you don't have any 'Nuts'… To get them to produce an egg,you need a 'Nut'. Do you want to buy some?”
Choco Billy “You better have a 'Chocobo Stable' prepared for the little ones,too.”
Choco Billy “I can't give you anything I don't have.”
Choco Billy “Which 'Nut' are you going to give 'em?”
Choco Billy “Which Chocobo are you going to feed it to?”
Choco Billy “Is this Chocobo all right?” Yes No
Choco Billy “How many?”
Choco Billy “Is this all right?” Yeah No Choose another one
Choco Billy “Is this one all right?” Yes Give it a different “Nut” Quit
Choco Billy “They gotta be male and female.”
Choco Billy “Which two Chocobos are you going to mate?”
“Talk to the two you like and make your decision.”
Choco Billy “There's only one…”
Choco Billy “So let's mate these two.” Go ahead No,I changed my mind
Choco Billy “You got yourself a new Chocobo!”
Choco Billy “You shouldn't mate those that just mated or those that were just born.”
Choco Billy “There doesn't seem to be any others you could mate it with.”
Chole “Hey,do you know what a Chocobo Sage is?”
Chole “What!? You've actually met him!?”
“Wow! What did he tell you?”
Chole “Wow,that's amazing! …Let me take some notes.”
Chole “Hey,did you ever see the Chocobo Sage again? What did he tell you?”
Chole “What?”
Chole “For telling me that story, I'll tell you about each Chocobo's abilities.”
Chole “I think it's ,`$& .”
Chole “That's ,`$& ”
Chole “From what I see, the fastest sprinter is…”
Chole “And,the fastest one is…”
Chole “Also,from what I can tell, the one with the most stamina is…”
Chole “Finally, the most intelligent one is…”
Chole “There are no Chocobos.”
Chole “Hey,there's only one Chocobo.”
One surprise: If you get the “Mountain Chocobo“ and the “River Chocobo“ to produce an egg,
You'll get a Chocobo that can cross mountains and rivers. I bet that the right nut for that is the “Carob Nut.”
